title: Milo Rau’s ‘Hate Radio,’ ‘Pelicot Trial’ and More Theater of the Real
summary_full: Milo Rau’s examination of the infamous broadcast that preceded the Rwandan genocide is onstage now. Two other works, including “The Pelicot Trial,” arrive in March.
summary_public: Milo Rau’s examination of the infamous broadcast that preceded the Rwandan genocide is onstage now. Two other works, including “The Pelicot Trial,” arrive in March.
